summary: I SAW A FOX NEWS REPORT ABOUT THE GEN 3 SEAT BELTS IN CHRYSLER PRODUCTS. I ALSO DID SOME RESEARCH ON MY OWN. I OWN A 1999 PLYMOUTH GRAND VOYAGER EQUIPPED WITH THESE SEAT BELTS. SINCE I TRANSPORT CHILDREN, INCLUDING TODDLERS AND INFANTS IN MY VAN, THIS REPORT HAS TROUBLED ME. I WAS WONDERING HOW MANY MORE INJURIES AND DEATHS IT WILL TAKE TO FORCE CHRYSLER TO RECALL THESE BELTS.*JB
